name: Rest-Pause (Dorian Yates-Inspired)
time_per_session_breakdown: Each set ~ 1 min total, with mini-rests of ~15-20s
overview_and_execution: Pick a heavy weight for ~6-8 reps to failure. Rack for ~15s, then do as many reps as possible again. Repeat 1-2 mini-rest segments. Typically 1 all-out rest-pause set per exercise.
example_application: Incline Press: 8 reps to failure @ 200 lb, rest 15s, 3 reps, rest 15s, 2 reps. Done.
important_notes: Extremely intense; not for beginners. Low volume, high effort. Good for advanced hypertrophy cycles.
volume_metrics: Each main set yields ~2-3 mini-bursts, total ~12-15 reps
